mapper.insert: insert into tb_freeboard (mno, title, content) values (#{mno}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.select: select f.*, m.mname from tb_freeboard as f left outer join tb_member as m on f.mno = m.mno where f.fno = #{fno};
